alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:13PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Oakland and Macomb Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clarkston, or 9 miles southeast of Holly, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pontiac and Oxford around 1225 PM EDT. Rochester around 1235 PM EDT. Romeo around 1240 PM EDT. Macomb Township around 1245 PM EDT. Armada around 1250 PM EDT. New Baltimore and Richmond around 1255 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Shelby Township, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Ray Center, Utica, Auburn Hills and Lake Angelus. People attending Roadkill Nights, and Milford Memories Summer Festival should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
